item.title: Should User Account Control be disabled?
item.description: Increasingly, as clients transition to Windows 7 or Vista, user account control issues are becoming more prevalent in Dynamics GP support, particularly with Dynamics GP Utilities. Users frequently encounter BCP utility errors after successfully launching utilities and logging in. A quick fix is to launch Dynamics GP Utilities as an administrator. While this is straightforward, I’ve observed a concerning trend of simply recommending the disabling of user account control altogether. This approach raises concerns for me.
